name: inflatable tandem kayak
description: inflatable kayak with detachable front and back seat - great for recreational use durable, hard-wearing, high quality hull - saltwater, oil, ozone and cold temperature resistant five-chamber design with safety valves and I-beam floor construction for enhanced stability double-bladed paddle with aluminum shaft and push-button ferrule adjusts feathering by 90° - can also be used as two single-blade paddles bow and stern spray covers removable footrest splash-proof stow bag packs down for easy storage and transport - carry bag included includes repair kit and instructions max. weight capacity (up to two adults): 352 lb. product weight: 15.4 lb. double-bladed paddle, extended length: 7.2' dimensions, inflated (L x W x H): 10.17' x 2.9' x 1.5'
longDescription:
• inflatable kayak with detachable front and back seat - great for recreational use
  • durable, hard-wearing, high quality hull - saltwater, oil, ozone and cold temperature resistant
  • five-chamber design with safety valves and I-beam floor construction for enhanced stability
  • double-bladed paddle with aluminum shaft and push-button ferrule adjusts feathering by 90° - can also be used as two single-blade paddles
  • bow and stern spray covers
  • removable footrest
  • splash-proof stow bag
  • packs down for easy storage and transport - carry bag included
  • includes repair kit and instructions
  • max. weight capacity (up to two adults): 352 lb.
  • product weight: 15.4 lb.
  • double-bladed paddle, extended length: 7.2'
  • dimensions, inflated (L x W x H): 10.17' x 2.9' x 1.5'
  • 3-year limited warranty
